tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance_information (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  research_project_id INT,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
  regulatory_body VARCHAR(100),
  compliance_deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance_information (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
  compliance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  project_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_agencies (
  agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR(100),
  contact_person VARCHAR(255),
  contact_email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance_info (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_date DATE,
    compliance_document TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE regulations (
    reg_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reg_name VARCHAR(255),
    reg_description TEXT,
    reg_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE development_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255),
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date DATE,
    activity_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance_information (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  regulation_code VARCHAR(10),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN,
  responsible_person VARCHAR(100),
  CONSTRAINT fk_project FOREIGN KEY (project_name) REFERENCES projects(name) ON DELETE CASCADE);

CREATE TABLE projects (name VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,
  project_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  project_manager VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE regulatory_documents (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(255),
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  upload_date TIMESTAMP,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  CONSTRAINT fk_project FOREIGN KEY (project_name) REFERENCES projects(name) ON DELETE CASCADE);

CREATE TABLE compliance_history (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  regulation_code VARCHAR(10),
  compliance_date DATE,
  compliance_rating INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_project FOREIGN KEY (project_name) REFERENCES projects(name) ON DELETE CASCADE);
